Package view.controller

Class PhotosController

java.lang.Object
view.controller.PhotosController
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminController, AlbumController, DateController, HomeController, LoginController, SlideshowController
public abstract class PhotosController
extends java.lang.Object
Abstract wrapper class for all controllers. Ensures that all controllers inherit the same state machine instance.
Author:
John Hoban, Kaushal Patel

      protected java.lang.String showInputDialog​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content)
      Utility method for showing a text input dialog.
      Parameters:
      stage - Stage from which this dialog is launched.
      title - Dialog title
      content - Dialog caption
      Returns:

    • showConfirmationDialog

      stage - Stage from which this dialog is launched
      title - Dialog title
      content - Dialog caption
      Returns:
      The user's response from the dialog.

    • showChoiceDialog

      protected <T> T showChoiceDialog​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content, java.util.Collection<T> choices)
      Utility method for showing a choice dialog.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type contained by choices
      Parameters:
      stage - Stage from which this dialog is launched
      title - Dialog title
      content - Dialog caption
      choices - Set of choices the user will choose from
      Returns:
      A response of type T, or null if there is none.

    • showImageDialog

      protected java.io.File showImageDialog​(javafx.stage.Stage stage, java.lang.String title)
      Utility method for showing a FileChooser dialog to fetch a photo.
      Parameters:
      stage - Stage from which this dialog is launched
      title - Dialog title
      Returns:
      A File pointing to the selected image.
